title: Shine
description: Aura is determined to unlock the mysteries of the Shift and her role in it. Logan is finally ready to pass on, and after an emotional farewell, Aura can at last move on and admit her feelings for Zachary. But when the government threatens her and Zachary in an attempt to discover what she knows, Aura knows that now more than ever she must protect herself and the ones she loves.
author: Jeri Smith-Ready
